features: WITCH HAZEL FACE WASH - Cleanse your pores with this refreshingly cool face cleanser that removes 99% of blemish causing dirt and oil.
SALICYLIC ACID ACNE TREATMENT - With a 2% Salicylic Acid formulation, Biore Witch Hazel Clarifying Cleanser helps to reduce acne breakouts and blackheads.
CREATE A CLEAR COMPLEXION - Use the Bioré Daily Acne Fighting Cleanser for deep cleansing to treat blemish prone skin. Leaving you with a clearer complexion.
BREAKDOWN DIRT AND RESIDUE - Formulated with Witch Hazel, a natural astringent, the Biore Pore Clarifying Cleanser breaks down dirt and residue for easy removal from pores.
CLEARER SKIN WITH DAILY USE - Biore Witch Hazel Cleanser can be used daily on acne-prone skin for clarifying results.
body.description: Bioré Pore Clarifying Cooling Facial Acne Cleanser is a refreshingly cool formula that works to deep clean by removing 99% of blemish causing dirt and oil. Blemish treatment for face features exfoliating salicylic acid treatment to clear pores and absorb unwanted oil on acne prone skin. Gentle skin cleanser carefully rejuvenates pores, leaving skin cleansed and refreshed. This acne face and body wash is ideal for those with acne prone, oily skin to remove blemishes. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Facial Cream
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this facial wash. I have noticed a great improvement in my skin since using this product. Wonderful purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Nice, Feels Nice!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it long yet but it has a nice cooling effect that isn't too cold [like if you use something with peppermint in it] and it leaves your skin feeling really refreshed. I primarily bought this because I'm vegan and wanted a witch hazel that was cruelty free/vegan without paying an arm and a leg- and I also loved that this is more of a soap so I didn't have to buy or use cotton balls/pads to rub it on my skin. It has a very light scent that's fresh- [take that tea tree oil- you smell like floor cleaner!] and I noticed the very first time I used it that some of the darker gunk in the pores around my nose went away immediately. This is such a big deal because I've used exfoliators, other cleaners that were far more expensive that claimed they would do that- and none made it go away. THE VERY FIRST TIME this worked. I'm going to keep using it for a month and hopefully I'll remember to update this review. I'm also going to use aloe after I wash my face with this to help with moisture. We'll see how it goes! So far, so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teenagers best friend
reviews.reviewText: My daughters face has been breaking out a lot lately, which is why I purchased this for her. She loves the smell of the soap, it foams really nicely. Leaves her skin soft, and clean.Great size bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I like my face wash to have some feedback without being too intense, and this one is slightly foamy, has a nice but not overbearing scent, and has a light tingling sensation. I feel like overall, it's subtler than some other face washes I've tried, but you can still tell that you are using a cleanser. My face feels nice and smooth when I'm done too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent alone is amazing
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely one of my absolute favorites. If you have trouble with your skin I would definitely recommend you to try this. The witch hazel works wonders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my wife and she had been using it for the break outs she gets. Does a great job at controlling oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No issues with the scent or use on sensitive skin. Easy to dispense. I don't feel that after a few weeks of using the product that there is any difference between this product and a bar of dial soap for cleansing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is awesome
reviews.reviewText: Very soothing for skin and really clean your pores 🙂
Es un producto utilizo constantemente en mi vida diaria y realmente me ayuda e evitar espinillas, me alisa mi piel y ayuda al control de grasa, recomendado
I like this a lot. Feels fresh and rejuvenating but not harsh on my skin. I use it just once a day though, and try to be cautious with the amount I use. Will definitely buy again
